website_summaries.verdict: The premier name in swimming and diving equipment has options for the budding water fanatic including this sturdy mask, perfect for kids and young adults.
pros: Comfortable silicone, easy-to-adjust head strap and tight-fitting face skirt lets kids who were afraid to put their faces in the water feel comfortable using this mask, which keeps water out of their noses and eyes
cons: Designed for smaller heads, so mask may not fit larger children

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: My kids fight over my seaventure adult mask, so I thought I'd get them a quality kids mask. I thought speedo brand would be a safe bet, especially with the positive reviews, but boy was I wrong! The mask itself doesn't even seal to my kids heads on the sides, rendering it utterly worthless, and on top of that, though the mask seal itself may be soft, the head strap itself has no stretch whatsoever like my seaventure mask, making it almost impossible for my kids to put on or take off by themselves. On a tight budget, this was a sad waste of money for a useless dollarstore-quality mask. I'd give it zero stars if possible!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Zipperle

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and easy to adjust the strap
customer_reviews.text: We had initially gotten some cheaper swim masks for the kids (and Speedos for the adults) but they were difficult to adjust and the straps were a bit flimsy and broke easily. We keep 5 or 6 pairs of children's masks as the neighbor kids are always wanting to swim with our kids and these are definitely much better than some of the cheaper ones. They are constantly wanting the straps adjusted which was a chore on the cheaper masks but is relatively quick and easy on these. Some things are worth spending the extra money on and this is one of those items, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a busy pool
customer_reviews.text: Little did I know how popular these would be at our pool when I ordered them. Bought them for the 5 &9 year old but the teenagers use them too. Fit well, easy to adjust and if you suction them to your face once they're wet, they stay in place and keep water out of both the eyes and nose. Would buy again and may even get a couple of the adult pairs so the teenagers don't steal them from The younger ones!
customer_reviews.author: J E H

customer_reviews.title: My girls LOVE these. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My girls swim very well. They swim without goggles or masks usually, eyes open. But in natural waters, like at our lake in Michigan, I felt better if they had eye protection. They used these all summer to swim in the shallows and explore the fish, rocks and shells, etc They love these! They fit well and both girls (age 5&7) can put them on and off themselves. They don’t leak much or at all and if there is a little water intrusion they know how to tip and drain. One of best toys of the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: "They really do keep the water out."
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 9-year-old son at the start of the summer. He used them every time he was in the pool and was always happy with them. His report is that "they really do keep the water out". They were simple enough to adjust to his head and held that adjustment even when take on and off repeatedly.
customer_reviews.author: Jen In VB

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (ages 4 and 6) were afraid to put their faces in the pool until I bought them these masks. As soon as they realized they could go under without getting water in their eyes or noses, they immediately started swimming underwater. It really improved their pool experience this summer. They love the masks and use them every time we go to the pool. They don't feel left out anymore and can keep up with their friends who also swim under the water. The masks are easy to adjust and definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 13yr old son
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time trying to find a swim mask online for my teenage son, due to lack of accurate information on sizing. Some are way too small (made for little kids) and some are just way too big (made for adults only). It's hard to find something in that mid-range size for a teen. Because this one is labeled "junior", I decided to take a chance, and I'm glad I did, as this fits him perfectly! My son is a very average size for a 13 year old, which means he has an average sized head as well. This fits great and I expect that it will for a couple more years.
customer_reviews.author: Bubblygirl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: A little big on my small 8year old but we adjusted to fit him. I can wear them as well and they work great!! No leaking!
customer_reviews.author: kristal henson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even fog!
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through 3 masks and finally found one that works. It secures well and has the pieces on the side to make sure the straps don't keep sliding out. My 6 year old son says it doesn't leak, and the craziest thing is that they never fog. I should have bought this brand sooner rather than buying all those masks at the local grocery. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These will last because the head band is not attached to the face seal
customer_reviews.text: I have a pool and lots of grand kids so I've learned a bit about these masks. Kids who are not competitive swimmers generally prefer masks that cover their noses to goggles. They seem to have more fun in the pool with these masks. When water leaks into the mask, the first thing a kid does is try to tighten the head band. If the head band is attached to the face seal, the face seal gets pulled out of the hard plastic piece of the mask and the thing is ruined. This model is great because the head band pulls on the hard plastic piece and not on the face seal.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Odekirk

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask, good quality, just slip off sometimes if you don'y have swimming hat
customer_reviews.text: My 5 years old kid started swimming a lot, he loves to go under water. I got the mask instead of goggles because I know goggle will squish his eyes. This mask gives him comfort on his eyes but block the water. One specially super super good point of this product : This mask will give a crystal clear view under water. this is high quality product, I tried myself and I was really surprised. Bad point : maybe cuz my kid has really small head..mask band slips off many times I think it could be because of his long hair as well..I recommend to use it with swimming hat
customer_reviews.author: Changik Choi

customer_reviews.title: The product actually worked fine for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The product actually worked fine for 4 months, swimming perhaps once a week...then the strap broke. Now I need to either research and try to find a replacement strap, or buy new goggles. I would not purchase this brand again, as I feel 4 months of occasional use should not cause an issue like this.
customer_reviews.author: B. st Louis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $20 I spent on them
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had them a month now and they already broke. I bought my other kiddo a cheaper $10 pair at Walmart ( not speedo brand) and hers are still going strong. A little disappointed in this pair. Fit was great though as this pair was for my 7 year old. And she did really like them, no complaints until they broke.
customer_reviews.author: C. Weyenberg

customer_reviews.title: This mask did not work for us and it kept coming off.
customer_reviews.text: I usually thought the name brand like speedo has good products and with the reviews, I thought this would work good. I had to return it since it kept coming off my daughters head and water kept coming in the mask. I had to literally re-adjust them for her and it just coming off. No matter how tight I put it on her it just did not work. No idea on what was going on, but I ordered a off brand mask and that work better than this speedo brand mask. Who knew.
customer_reviews.author: Gokou

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WORRY, WHAT OTHERS WROTE, IT IS CERTAINLY TRUE!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 great grandsons just got in the water and dove under, I was amazed no water in their eyes or nose. They are crazy about them. I know by wearing this Speedo Googles they will certainly learn to swim much faster. There friend who did not have googles eyes burned from the chlorine. Next purchase swim fins cause they are really underwater a lot, might as well do this thing right.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for the beginner swimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly blocks their nose from getting water in it, but doesn't pinch it at all. My 6 year old is a good swimmer put insists on pinching the nose closed to keep water out. Found these at the local YMCA, where they have community googles and ended up buying our own pair. Definitely a must buy. Kids can use it in the ocean as well. Provides a perfectly airtight seal around eyes and nose as once mask.
customer_reviews.author: MagicMike

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles.
customer_reviews.text: These are great goggles. I gave it 4 stars because the goggles strap will loosen when my kid tries to put them off. She also said there is a nose piece that sometimes hurts here nose when she jumps in the water because of the pressure change. They also slide off occasionally when diving into water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do their job. No water in.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old really likes these. She doesn’t have to plug her nose when jumping in. Great suction. Because of that, They are kinda tight on the head (hard to take on and off) but that’s the trade off. Hope they last a whole summer. Seem to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a wide range of sizes
customer_reviews.text: These give kids so much more confidence when swimming. We had kids from age 4-10 use them and the fit everyone well. A couple adults also tried them, and while they were a little small in the face, they still worked. They are easy to adjust and don't loosen up when wearing them. We bought 3 pairs in different colors and have not had an issue with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom/student nurse/shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: If you're like us, you've tried a bunch of different goggle brands for your kids, hoping the $8 ones would work and they never do. We have found that these Speedo goggles work very well and this is now the only brand we trust. We've tried soooo many and they all leak or hurt my kids faces. Even the Disney ones are awful quality! But Speedo works! We have bought 3 pairs now and they all are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BGill

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe i paid $15 for this mask. I've seen so many other options cheaper that work better. This mask is really stiff and it's hard for my kids to get it over their heads. They don't use it at all. Instead, they found a $6 mask that came WITH a snorkel at Walgreens and they use those all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all 4 of my kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids range from 5-13 years old. We bought one mask to see who it would be best for. It ended up being perfect for all of them. We will be ordering 3 more of this exact mask for the other 3. Great fit. They were able to dive and swim without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and fit for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: BuY these you will be happy I’m so glad I didn’t let acouple bad reviews get to me these are finally what I have been searching for for 2 years now . I told all my friend a get for there kids everyone is so happy I got ages from 5/8 fir them all perfect . OKAY I bought 3 more of these too . I will be buying another one as we speak because I’m taking to Disney and Incase I lose it I want to be covered at home .🙂
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandkid's LOVED them
customer_reviews.text: I'm a SCUBA diver and appreciate a mask that fits well. We bought two of these and gave them to our grand-kids (4 & 6). They couldn't get out of the pool and these masks where part of the reason. They are learning to be super comfortable in the water and we needed to break the plugging-the-nose-with-the-thumb-and-forefinger-pinch-method. The mask worked, now swimming with both arms is working great.
customer_reviews.author: PNW native

customer_reviews.title: Easily Fall Off
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the goggles are great however they slip off my daughter's head very easily. The band in the back of the head doesn't have any texture so you have to make the goggles very tight, but they still don't stay on very well. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dayton Britton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 7 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. My daughter wanted to be able to go upside-down in the water without having to hold her nose, so we considered nose plugs but ultimately settled on this mask. It was difficult to adjust initially, but I don't think the mask is at fault - it just needs to fit exactly or it leaks, slides, or is uncomfortably tight. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: locally grown

customer_reviews.title: Fits very comfortably
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask -this is the second one I bought because my kids love them. Age 8-12- Suctions good And they’re comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: The Tweeddale's

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We are in the pool about 4 times a week, so gets a lot of use out of goggles. Bought the last kids Speedo mask for my daughter and she got about 3 summers out of it. When her old ones finally broke, I made sure to buy the same brand again. These fit my 9-year-old daughter perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Priceless
customer_reviews.text: Put a big smile on my 8 year old sons face! He absolutely loves these goggles. Nice quality. Love the shiny blue color. Was able to adjust the goggles to fit my sons head and my son has a large head. My son swam in them for a long time. He liked that water didnt go up his nose. He even said he can kinda breath air that gets stuck in there underwater. Best of all I don't have to worry about dirty chlorine getting in his eyes or up his nose!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Wells-lipton

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how this would fit or what the quality of it would be. Both were really good. Couldn't have asked for a better fit. I purchased for my 15 year old daughter. Fits her perfectly. I tried it on because I need one for a snorkeling trip. It fits my head and face perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a month
customer_reviews.text: My kid liked theses until they broke. They didn't even last a month. So not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: luv4books

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and value.
customer_reviews.text: My son wore these on our trip to Jamaica. He loved them and told me that they kept all water out of his eyes and really did not fog up. I would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Swimming Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 5 year old grandson & these have been a game changer with his confidence & his swimming has greatly improved! He still uses goggles, but loves these to do somersaults under water& just trying anything. Great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles ever!! I'm a 62 year old woman with a narrow face so these worked well. I didn't even need nose plugs because of the mask. I'm very happy! My only complaint is that it didn't come in a case. Others that I've ordered ALWAYS came with one.
customer_reviews.author: Gina De Shrage

customer_reviews.title: Good Goggles Once Adjusted
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a trip to Florida. My Tween daughter used them several times. It took a little work to get them to fit correctly. Once adjusted they fit good and were comfortable. They were not comfortable the first two times they were used and they left red marks on her face.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m never one to leave a negative review but I am so disappointed in this mask. I ordered this thinking when they said junior that it meant kids sized like youth size. I just received this for my 9 year old (who’s on the smaller side anyway) and it has absolutely zero give! I cannot even get it onto his face without it hurting! I understand these are supposed to be tight and snug, but I’m not mauling my kid to get it on. Luckily I’ll give this to my niece and finding a better fitting mask!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kimani

customer_reviews.title: Nice goggles
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a couple pairs of these for my girls. Very happy with them. Much better to just order these instead of wasting money on Walmart or Dollar Store cheapies that leak. My daughters say these are comfortable and do not leak. I would for sure order again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Romero

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep the water out no Matter what You do have had many of these before first brand I had a problem with
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Sackosky

customer_reviews.title: I love it! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I really love this swimming mask. It stops water from entering your nose, which is painful! It doesn’t fog up neither. This mask encouraged me to open my eyes without even using the mask underwater. When I didn’t have the mask at first, I was having hard times stopping water form getting in my nose. Now that I use it a lot, since the mask stops the breathing through your nose, if you ever swim without, you will probably get used to it and water won’t get in your nose. I love it. Every time I go to my local pool, I bring my mask and swim free! 😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Jalen Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: The kid has went through a lot of goggles. She's had all sorts of brands and kinds. These are her absolute favorite. She said they don't even leak when she does a back flip (which apparently ALWAYS happens with others🤷‍♀️).
customer_reviews.author: Lady M

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters loves these!
customer_reviews.text: These works so much better than the cheap ones you can get in the box store. The lenses stay very clear and they seal to your face to keep the water out. All three of my granddaughter's love these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for kittle ones who want their nose covered.
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo likes these a lot. Greater fit than typical snorkling goggles. Not too bulky. Plastic stops just under nose rather than covering the entire upper lip, which she liked a lot better. Easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: CNS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: The band snapped the 2nd time my kids used them!
customer_reviews.author: Eddee H.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! First pair I bought for my son. The strap got annoying so I removed it and the goggles still stay on his face when under water as long as he pushes them on his face correctly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Case

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, but not strong enough to defeat my daughter's tugging
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these goggles, but they broke in less than 2 months. She's really hard on them, though - tugging on the plastic in the wrong direction until it just split. Despite this, because they fit her so well, I'm buying another pair. I hope they last longer this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still too big for the little ones.
customer_reviews.text: Please note these are not the same kids size as the pair you get in theset. Despite also being "youth" sized, these are actually a bit larger than the ones that come in that set—too large for my 9 year old's face. So if you are like me and just want to buy the goggles (and not the snorkel) that comes in that set then you are out of luck, because these goggles are going to be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great water mask
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing mask no water gets in what so ever I’ve had many gogles that sucked, but speedo always does a good job with there products these are my goal to water mask for breast strokes.
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: She loves them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her goggles. She says they are perfect in the fit, ease of use, comfort and style. She like the that she doesn’t have to plug her nose under water while wearing these. She says, “now I can use both my arms for swimming “.
customer_reviews.author: Unimommie

customer_reviews.title: No Leaks, Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a US Divers mask for my 6 year old grandson. It has a plastic skirt which was stiff and leaked a little. It also fogged up immediately. This one has a soft silicone skirt which conforms to his face. No fog! A great mask for a really reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable swim goggles
customer_reviews.text: Both of the grandkids swim with these goggles. Their time in the water has expanded now that they can swim under the water with eyes open and see everything! Can not be without them!
customer_reviews.author: True Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 4 and 6 year olds
customer_reviews.text: My kids love their goggles and both learned to swim the day they got them because they made them brave enough to put their faces in the water. They've used them swimming many times with no leaking problems. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 5 yr old
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 yr old and they fit her perfectly. She can put them on and take them off so easily and they don’t leak. They have helped to to swim underwater this year. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the $
customer_reviews.text: It lasted for one pool season... So, for the $ it is a decent product... The strap did break, but I was able to loosen the other side and adjust so my son could still use them
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Straps break quickly.
customer_reviews.text: All I have bought suffer broken straps. These are masks for kids, handled by kids - the straps should be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great for 9 months in Chlorine
customer_reviews.text: I wish these lasted longer. I do laps in the pool three times a week, wash them immediately after every swim and dry them thoroughly. The rubber breaks every time (strap). 3rd order.
customer_reviews.author: Dulci Hill

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and Get Loose after prolonged wear
customer_reviews.text: These constantly fall off my son’s even though they’re tighten properly. Also, my son says they’re uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable goggles
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of goggles for my seven-year-old grandson. He has been through a few already have broken quickly. But this pair has lasted well over six months already and he loves them he can have them on the whole day while he’s playing in the pool or the beach.
customer_reviews.author: penni porter

customer_reviews.title: Great product that my kid loves!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for my 5 year old. He is 45” tall and weighs 45 lbs. These were purchased after a different pair would not seal around his face. These work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. The return window closed
customer_reviews.text: We'e brought two and they both broke after about 10 uses. The straps are not durable, both broke in the same place. Very disappointed. The return window closed. Total waste of money. :(
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Work well. Fit faces of my 7, 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Fit faces of my 7, 10, and 12 year olds! No leaking. 7 year old started doing somersaults once she realized no water would go up her nose. I wish I would have bought them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for young children
customer_reviews.text: Works good but not great for my 4 year old I bought because the smaller pair r to small and tight on his nose so these were the only next size up but they r to big they work but the do get water and it won't stay up so it hurts his ears I think for 10 and up they would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Rob esposito

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My oldest child, 8, uses this. Much better quality and product than previous goggle masks. Love that the strap has buttons so it doesn’t loosen on its own over a day in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom2

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but broken strap and scratches on lens.
customer_reviews.text: Used for my 5 year old granddaughter. The fit is great but used only weekly in our pool and the strap broke! There are already scratches on the lens. Not very durable product for the money. Would like replacement! One year warranty should last at least 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Teston

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t leak, 7 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy this online but my 7 year old daughter wanted one for her winter birthday (pool party), so where else could I find one? This works so well and it hasn’t leaked yet in the 6 months we’ve been using it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for these for my 5 year old who is just starting to put his head underwater. Unfortunately, these kept slipping off his head, even when tightened. These are too big for him. I saw a ‘kids’ Speedo google mask at target which may be a better fit for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewreader

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a five-year-old. He loves them, as do his friends who are a few years younger and older. They adjust easily but don't lose their hold or loosen while using.
customer_reviews.author: Mollatron

customer_reviews.title: Little swimmers
customer_reviews.text: Got these goggles for my grandchildren. They love them although they have said there is a small leak in one pair of them. Overall they’re happy! That means I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old daughter was so excited to try them out she used them in her bath and they are great! These masks are very well made, easy to adjust and work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Product just as pictured. Very pleased with seller got far before imagined during COVID. Sturdy and functional goggles!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 6 year old and it's working great! He can swim underwater with no leaks and it fits his head just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Kid Tested and Approved!
customer_reviews.text: these are the best swim masks. My kids 7, 8, 11 all love them and find them to be very reliable at keeping water out of their eyes and nose. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: ruth denman

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. Her friends keep borrowing her goggles when we are swimming because these work so well- no leaking! We’re buying a second pair to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and worked great for kids and small adults. Kinda pricy but it is great quality so you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We own 4 now and my kids and the neighbor kids always fight over using these ones. Hence why I ordered 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old LOVES these goggles! She can’t swim without goggles and these have perfect fit and function. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kati S

customer_reviews.title: Change in design - straps now slip out
customer_reviews.text: The design is different from the one we bought last year and the straps slip out. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 11 year old daughter. The adjustable straps allow for a perfect fit. No water leaking into her face.
customer_reviews.author: AmyE

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is no longer afraid to go under water without holding her nose! A great transition to underwater swimming! No water gets through
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Preferred over goggles
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids ages 6 and 8 prefer these masks over tradition goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Dianita

customer_reviews.title: Total game-changer for our 5 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 yr old loved these from the start. For the first time, she started dunking her head under the water and zipping around in the pool. No complaints of water leaking in, no crazy lines on her face after, and no signs of fogging at all. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. I buy these masks for my kids every year to use in our pool. It holds up well, does not leak or squeeze the face and sits on their face comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Great for a reluctant swimmer
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend these goggles if you have a reluctant swimmer. As usual, they are a bit hard to get on, but my five-year-old FINALLY went under the water!
customer_reviews.author: Handersen Publishing

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter finally started putting her face in the water after using these. They are a little large for her face but work and will fit for a long time. They are great quality and a fun color
customer_reviews.author: turtley78

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the water out
customer_reviews.text: So the goggles keep the water out, which is (of course) why I bought them, so 5 stars for that, but the strap broke after only a few weeks and so I have had to order a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jennings

customer_reviews.title: The best,  cant wait for summet
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait until summer! So she play in the tub for seem like for every lol... says she swimming..
customer_reviews.author: Nazzy

customer_reviews.title: good fit, they don't leak!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my kids. Probably one of the best pair they have had. The dont leak and fit nicely on a 10yo and 7 yo.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality goggles!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves these goggles! They fit him perfectly and he says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof lol..
customer_reviews.text: Good goggles. My daughter likes them and wear them all the time. If I asked her, she would say “Great!”
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: great for those beginners
customer_reviews.text: Not having to plug her nose gave my little girl the confidence to really dive and learn to feel comfortable under water.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: 5-year-old Son Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. My son loves them. They're easy to get on, stay on, and adjust easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andy in TN

customer_reviews.title: Best mask for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wider (height) mask. Excellent for kiddos. I have bought several kinds for my kids and this is by far the best!! Well work it.
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can swim now because of these goggles. It took her fear away and she can swim from 3ft to 8ft in our pool!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Bright

customer_reviews.title: Great swim mask!
customer_reviews.text: 6-yr-old with huge noggin approves! Happy with purchase and the lenses don't fog which has been hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is a little high for a swim mask but you get want you pay for. Excellent quality... would highly recommend. Does not let water seep in
customer_reviews.author: FranC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece who just loves them. She likes using them to take a shower ... hates water in her eyes 👀
customer_reviews.author: susana5019

customer_reviews.title: Perfect goggles!
customer_reviews.text: My son lives in these in the pool! No leaking and fit his little 7 year old face so well!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Seagroves

customer_reviews.title: Nice goggles
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Run a little smaller than advertised. There’s no way this would fit a kid over 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter’s Easter basket. We get both kids a pair every year. They work great
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Adjusts easily. Just mad had to buy 2nd pair bc the first was lost lol
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems good, and the rubber is flexible, but no matter how I adjust it, water gets in. I've had other swim masks that kept the water out.
customer_reviews.author: SilverSurfer

product_meta.title: Speedo Unisex-child Adventure Swim Mask Junior
product_meta.description:
They'll be able to focus on creating underwater adventures with this full-coverage mask designed for smaller faces. Anti-fog lenses make it easy to keep a sharp lookout for treasures, while a silicone skirt provides a snug fit that keeps water out of their eyes for a more comfortable swim.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :9 x 8 x 4 inches; 5.6 Ounces
 * Item model number :USXJRADVTMASKY
 * Department :Unisex-baby
 * Date First Available :August 25, 2009
 * Manufacturer :Warnaco Swimwear - Speedo Equipment
 * ASIN :B002MUPY3E

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #1,240 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #1 inDiving Masks 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars2,328 ratings They'll be able to focus on creating underwater adventures with this full-coverage mask designed for smaller faces. Anti-fog lenses make it easy to keep a sharp lookout for treasures, while a silicone skirt provides a snug fit that keeps water out of their eyes for a more comfortable swim.
feature_bullets: Polycarbonate lenses with anti-fog coating for clear viewing
Comfort fit silicone skirt for leak-proof fit
Jr. Size – fits most children and young adults 6-14 years old
